metadata.title: CVE-2023-52459 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: media:v4l: async: Fix duplicated list deletion The list deletion call droppedhere is already called from the helper function in the line before. Havinga second list_del() call results in either a warning (withCONFIG_DEBUG_LIST=y): list_del corruption, c46c8198->next is LIST_POISON1(00000100) If CONFIG_DEBUG_LIST is disabled the operation results in akernel error due to NULL pointer dereference.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
